definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
handle or shaft (of an axe etc)/(of a flower, leaf or fruit) stem/sth that affords an advantage to an opponent/classifier for knives or blades

sentences.english: A jug usually has a spout or a narrow neck, and a handle.
sentences.chinese: 細口罐通常都有壺嘴或是細頸及手柄。

sentences.english: Lock blade arm down with safety latch before installing handle.
sentences.chinese: 安裝手柄前請用安全插銷鎖下刀臂。

sentences.english: Distinctive orange handle indicates "open/close" and direction of flow at a distance.
sentences.chinese: 獨特的橙色手柄可以遠距離指示“啓閉”和流體方向。

sentences.english: Distinctive red handle indicates "open/close" and direction of flow at a distance.
sentences.chinese: 特別的紅色手柄能夠遠距離表示“啓閉”和流向。

sentences.english: Deep Cut Band Saw has a front T-handle for better control.
sentences.chinese: 深切割帶鋸有一個前置T型手柄，能更好地進行控制。

sentences.english: Structured bag with double short handles and a spring-action etched logo lock.
sentences.chinese: 雙短手柄和彈簧行動蝕刻標識鎖的結構性袋。

sentences.english: Please put the electronic card close to the sensor area of the lock, and then turn the handle to open the door.
sentences.chinese: 請將電子卡靠近門鎖感應區，轉動手柄即可開啓房門。

sentences.english: It can be equipped with a manual handle or with pneumatic or electric actuators.
sentences.chinese: 可裝配手柄和氣動或電動傳動器。

sentences.english: Secant blade lift, swing all by the handle adjustment, simple and efficient.
sentences.chinese: 割線鋸片升降，擺動全部由手柄調節，簡便高效。

sentences.english: Rapid traverse apron is easily operated by a single control level.
sentences.chinese: 快移溜板箱採用單手柄集中操縱，方便靈活。

sentences.english: The greenish-yellow glass amphora has handles formed in the shape of dolphins.
sentences.chinese: 裝紅酒的瓶子呈綠黃色，有海豚狀的手柄。

sentences.english: Suppose that both the regulating handle and the reversing handle are at the stop position.
sentences.chinese: 假設調節手柄和換向手柄都在停止位置。

sentences.english: Suppose that both the regulating handle and the reversing handle are at the stop position.
sentences.chinese: 假設調節手柄和換向手柄都在停止位置。

sentences.english: Role in human, by turning the handle to power the cutter reached.
sentences.chinese: 在人力作用下，通過手柄的轉動將動力傳到刀盤。

sentences.english: Hold the print cartridge by the handle and insert it into the all-in- one.
sentences.chinese: 抓住打印碳粉盒的手柄，將其插入多功能一體機。

sentences.english: Bakelite handle, fine heat-resistance , handy, convenient, large quantity of steam.
sentences.chinese: 膠木手柄，耐溫性好，輕巧方便，氣量大。

definition: button or key (on a device)/keystroke/CL:個|个[ge4]/to press a button
body of a vehicle or machine/fuselage of a plane
(of a magnet) to attract metallic objects/(fig.) to exert a magnetic attraction (for investment, tourists etc)
